title: General form
text: If "I varies inversely with the square of d" then the general form of our relationship will be $$I=\frac{k}{d^2}$$.

title: Finding k
text: The constant k can be found by multiplying $$I d^2$$.

title: Evaluating k
text: k $$=I d^2$$. If $$I=0.08$$ when $$d=3$$, what is k?

title: Finding new distance
text: Now we know our relationship is I $$=\frac{0.72}{d^2}$$. To find the new intensity at a distance of $$8$$ meters, plug in $$d=8!$$
